about.description: I'm a full stack developer focused on Laravel and Ruby on Rails, driven by solving real-world problems through well-structured solutions. My approach is both systemic and practical — I like to understand how things work before building anything. That mindset helps me deliver stable, maintainable code that makes sense from both a technical and business perspective.
about.description-2: I believe that software development is an art, and like any art, it should be done with passion and dedication. In every project, I strive to combine technical clarity with a product-oriented vision, understanding the needs of both the client and the end user. I like to think beyond the code — considering the flow, experience, and impact of what I'm building.

exp1.description: Maintenance, updates, and development of institutional websites, focusing on performance, stability, and continuous improvements.

exp2.description: Development of a subscription and plan system using Laravel, including payment gateway integration and email automation.

exp3.description: Development of a clinic management system using Ruby on Rails and React, involving software architecture and automated testing.

exp4.description: Creation of graphic materials and videos for visual communication, brand identity, and supervision of production and installation.

exp5.description: Provided technical services in IT and networking, including maintenance, assembly of equipment, and customer support.
